Recommendations.@Core.Description: Computes AI-based recommendations for the bound entity and its related entities
Recommendations.@Core.LongDescription: The function SHOULD compute the recommendations asynchronously, see [this diagram](../docs/recommendations.md).

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Entities, properties or action/function parameters for which recommendations shall be retrieved
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription:
Implementations of this function MAY omit this parameter.
            If this parameter is omitted (by the implementation or in the invocation), all recommendations are retrieved.

$ReturnType.@Core.Description: A collection of recommendations that differ in their `AIRecommendedFieldPath` property

URLs.@Core.Description: URLs (relative to the request URL) that address entities, properties or action/function parameters for which recommendations shall be retrieved
URLs.@Core.LongDescription:
The request `SalesOrder('A')/AI.Recommendations?AIRecommendationTargets={"URLs":["","Items(10)"]}`
            retrieves recommendations for the entities `SalesOrder('A')` and `SalesOrder('A')/Items(10)`.

AIRecommendedFieldPath.@Core.Description: URL (relative to the URL of the [`Recommendations`](#Recommendations) function request) addressing a property [OData-URL, section 4.6](https://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/os/part2-url-conventions/odata-v4.01-os-part2-url-conventions.html#sec_AddressingaProperty) that is targeted by this recommendation
AIRecommendedFieldPath.@Core.LongDescription:
The request `SalesOrder('A')/AI.Recommendations?AIRecommendationTargets=...`
            might retrieve a recommendation with `"AIRecommendedFieldPath": "Items(10)/Product"`.

AIAltvRecmddFldVals.@Core.Description: A list of alternative values, sorted by confidence score in descending order
AIAltvRecmddFldVals.@Core.LongDescription: If a value is recommended via property `AIRecommendedFieldValue`, it must be the first entry in this list.

AIRecommendedFieldValue.@Core.Description: Alternatively recommended value, converted to string

AIRecommendedFieldScore.@Core.Description: Confidence score of the alternatively recommended value

RecommendationsRole.@Core.Description: Role of this property or parameter regarding AI-based recommendations

@Validation.AllowedValues.@Core.Description: The property is input for some recommendation
The property or parameter is the target of some recommendation
The property is input for and the target of some recommendation
The property is required input before any recommendations are requested
